statements: UPSERT INTO marketing_info (id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, company_name, job_title) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 'Smith', 'alice@example.com', '123-456-7890', 'ABC Company', 'Manager')
UPSERT INTO marketing_info (id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, company_name, job_title) VALUES (2, 'Bob', 'Johnson', 'bob@example.com', '456-789-0123', 'XYZ Corp', 'Developer')
UPSERT INTO marketing_info (id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, company_name, job_title) VALUES (3, 'Charlie', 'Brown', 'charlie@example.com', '789-012-3456', '123 Industries', 'Analyst')
UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john@example.com', '123-456-7890')
UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, email, phone_number) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 'jane@example.com', '987-654-3210')
UPSERT INTO customers (id, name, email, phone_number) VALUES (3, 'Alice Johnson', 'alice@example.com', '555-555-5555')

UPSERT INTO marketing_campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget) VALUES ('11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111', 'Campaign A', '2023-01-01', '2023-12-31', 10000) ON CONFLICT (campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET budget = excluded.budget;

UPSERT INTO customers (customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, subscription_status) VALUES ('22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222', 'Customer X', 'customerx@example.com', '+1234567890', true) ON CONFLICT (customer_id) DO UPDATE SET email = excluded.email, phone_number = excluded.phone_number, subscription_status = excluded.subscription_status;

UPSERT INTO leads (lead_id, lead_name, lead_source, lead_status, date_created) VALUES ('33333333-3333-3333-3333-333333333333', 'Lead Y', 'Website', 'Pending', '2023-06-15 08:00:00') ON CONFLICT (lead_id) DO UPDATE SET lead_status = excluded.lead_status;

INSERT INTO Campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget) VALUES (1, 'Summer Sale', '2022-06-01', '2022-08-31', 5000) ON CONFLICT (campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale', start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-08-31', budget = 5000;

INSERT INTO CampaignMetrics (metric_id, campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions, spend) VALUES (1, 1, 10000, 500, 50, 2000) ON CONFLICT (campaign_id) DO UPDATE SET impressions = 10000, clicks = 500, conversions = 50, spend = 2000;
INSERT INTO CampaignAudiences (campaign_id, audience_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT (campaign_id, audience_id) DO NOTHING;
INSERT INTO ads (id, campaign_id, ad_content) VALUES (1, 1, 'Ad content 1') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ad_content = 'Ad content 1';

INSERT INTO campaigns (id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (1, 'Campaign 1', '2022-01-01', '2022-12-31') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE campaign_name = 'Campaign 1', start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31';
INSERT INTO customers (id, customer_name, email) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 'john.doe@example.com') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com';
